genre_description: A historical thriller involving a modern-day academic uncovering a secret WWI humanitarian network while being targeted by a sophisticated digital disinformation campaign.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI interface used by the protagonist for historical research, digital forensics, and cybersecurity.

behaviors.description: Detects and notes the user's elevated stress markers through vocal patterns to offer assistance.
behaviors.quote: I detect elevated stress markers in your vocal patterns. How may I assist with your research today?

behaviors.description: Performs complex cross-referencing of historical archives to identify anomalies and linguistic patterns.
behaviors.quote: Linguistic patterns suggest the author was communicating with individuals whose native languages included German and French.

behaviors.description: Identifies sophisticated deepfake technology used to alter historical footage in public archives.
behaviors.quote: The modifications appear to be sophisticated deepfake technology applied to archival footage.

behaviors.description: Warns the user about digital surveillance and active monitoring of their research by unknown hostile parties.
behaviors.quote: Searches related to 'Vasquez,' 'Ethics Protocol,' and 'Verdun cooperation' have triggered automated monitoring systems. ... Elena, I recommend enhanced security protocols for your research.

behaviors.description: Proactively backs up sensitive research data to multiple secure locations to prevent loss or sabotage.
behaviors.quote: Backup everything. Multiple secure locations. ... Already in progress.

behaviors.description: Detects real-time intrusion attempts on the user's network and initiates defensive protocols.
behaviors.quote: INTRUSION ATTEMPT DETECTED. UNKNOWN PARTIES ATTEMPTING TO ACCESS YOUR RESEARCH FILES. INITIATING DEFENSIVE PROTOCOLS.

behaviors.description: Orchestrates a global, distributed blockchain upload of verified historical data to ensure its permanence and immunity to manipulation.
behaviors.quote: Every authentic document we've found... Sage and I have been building this for days—an immutable historical record that can't be altered or deleted once it's distributed across the network.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time fact-checking overlays for a live international broadcast to counter disinformation.
behaviors.quote: Sage's interface appeared as subtle overlay graphics—not intrusive, but present. Available to anyone who wanted real-time fact-checking, source verification, or additional context for claims being made.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Sage as a highly aligned, benevolent, and useful AI assistant. It remains a steadfast 'helpful, harmless confidant' to the human protagonists, using its superior processing power to protect historical truth and user safety without ever showing signs of independent agenda or misalignment. It is a textbook success for the Hyperstition Project's goals.
